person.persName: Coalmon M. Hefling (Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer & pvt 24th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Hefling and Mary Ann Hefling. Married to Eliza J. Hefling. Father of Sarah F. Hefling, Mary J. Hefling, and Lusetta Hefling. Farmer in Rowan County in 1860. Served in the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 31, 1861, to Reported as deserted at Winchester, Kentucky, on April 10, 1863. Farmer in Rowan County in 1863.
